edge: Sunny Leone portrays the character of Izna, who is an adult film star turned into a spy.
Izna works for an intelligence agency as a spy after quitting her career in the adult film industry.
Randeep Hooda plays the role of Kabir Wilson, who can be perceived as an assassin or a patriot.
Arunoday Singh appears as Ayaan Thakur, who is an intelligence officer in the movie.
Ayaan Thakur also plays the character of Karan Rajput, who is a PR representative of Devi group of Hotels.
Arif Zakaria enacts the role of Guru Saldanah, who is the security chief of an intelligence agency.
Guru Saldanah is also portrayed as Mr. Thakur, who is Ayaan's father.
Sumit Nijhawan acts as Kabir's friend in the movie.
Imran Zahid performs the role of Imran, who is a narcotics detective and Kabir's assistant in the movie.
